resources.string: News Feed provides with all the news across the globe of your interests only :)
Currently News Feed Provides news from India and 5 other countries over 6 categories Our only goal is that the user should get the news of their own interests only.
News Feed is also an Open Source Project. You can check out the code base at https://github.com/AVNV2201/News-Feed-Mini-Project-/ . So feel free to contribute.
Currently, It provides the features such as Making Notes, Getting weather updates, saving news through Red Later Mode and getting news country_wise and category_wise
